name: Armaan Malik
description: '''Armaan Malik''' (born 22 July 1995) is an Indian [[playback singer]], [[Songwriter|song writer]], [[Voice acting|voice-over artist]], and [[actor]]. Previously represented by [[Universal Music India]] and [[T-Series (company)|T-Series]], he is now managed by [[Arista Records]]. He made his debut as a child singer in Bollywood in 2007 with the song '''[[Taare Zameen Par|"Bum Bum Bhole"]]''' in the movie ''[[Taare Zameen Par]]''. His first on-screen appearance was in the film ''[[Kaccha Limboo]]'' in 2011.
